author: n3tsurge
description: This capability outlines the process of revoking authentication credentials for users or systems that are no longer authorized to access resources. It includes steps for identifying the credentials to be revoked, executing the revocation, and ensuring that access is effectively terminated to prevent unauthorized use. This capability is essential for maintaining security and compliance during incident response.

requirements.description: Complete understanding of threat scope and affected systems.
Tools and access necessary to remove threats and restore system integrity.
Validation methods to confirm complete threat removal.

title: Revoke Authentication Credentials

references.name: NIST SP 800-61 Rev. 2: Computer Security Incident Handling Guide
